title: Harbor-Front Condo with Harbor Views!
posting_body: ['Harbor-Front Condo with Harbor Views!', 'Property Address', '388 E. Ocean Blvd.', '#901 | Long Beach, CA 90802', 'Available: 09/15/2022', 'Offered By', 'Ernst and Haas Management Co.', 'Description', 'This stunning luxury condo is now available and features a long list of amenities.', 'A fresh, bright, and modern paint scheme compliments the crown molding accented 10-foot ceilings and oversized windows, which offer breathtaking views of the city and harbor.', 'The unit also boasts beautiful laminate flooring, upgraded fixtures, and appliances throughout, creating an elegant and inviting theme.', 'The kitchen boasts granite countertops, a refrigerator, dishwasher, stove, and microwave.', 'For your convenience, a washer and dryer are also included in the unit.', 'Relax on the private balcony and take in the stunning views of the harbor and the ocean, stretching from Palos Verdes to Catalina Island.', 'Building amenities include gated entry, 2 gated parking spaces, pool, fitness center, sun deck, spa, 24-hour concierge service, and much more!', 'This condo is pet friendly and is within walking distance of Long Beach attractions.', 'Located near Ocean Blvd.', 'and Magnolia Ave.', 'For more information on this or any other available property, please contact Ernst & Haas Management at', 'show contact info', ', or visit us online at <URL> and apply today.', 'TO QUALIFY:', '• Credit score must be no less than 600', '• Monthly gross income to qualify must be 2 ½ times the rent', '• We do not accept past evictions, judgments, or collections from a management company or landlord', '• Renter’s Insurance is required.', 'Proof of coverage must be provided upon the signing of your lease.', '*Note - See selection criteria for a detailed list of qualifications on our website at <URL>', 'PLEASE BE AWARE OF RENTAL SCAMS:', 'We caution all applicants to be diligent in researching the legitimacy of any potential rental listing.', 'All deposits, rents, and rental agreements\xa0are ONLY executed at Ernst & Haas Management, 4120 Atlantic Ave., Long Beach, CA.', 'If you are being asked to fill out a third-party application or are being asked to pay cash or send money via an App, Western Union, Money-Gram, or Prepaid Visa card,\xa0STOP\xa0these\xa0are signs of rental listing scams used to defraud applicants.', 'Ernst and Haas Management Co.', 'DRE License #01251870', '*ALL INFORMATION DEEMED ACCURATE BUT NOT GUARANTEED.', 'APPLIANCES ARE PROVIDED AS A COURTESY AND ARE NOT MANDATORY TO THE LEASE.', 'TERMS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE.', 'Amenities', 'Stove', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Washer/Dryer', 'Water Paid', 'Trash Paid', 'Gardening Services Paid', '2 Parking Spaces', 'Gated Parking', 'Gated Entry', 'Elevator', '24-Hour Concierge', 'Fitness Center', 'Pool', 'Spa', 'Sundeck', 'Balcony', 'Laminate Flooring', 'Central A/C  & Heat', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Blinds', 'Pets Considered', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/2.0BA', 'Square Feet: 960', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,995.00', 'Available: 09/15/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $3,000.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Small dogs allowed']
